Research

Amplification, Hashtag Activism, Networked (Counter)publics

I am a computational social scientist studying online political communication and how people amplify their voices through networked spaces.

See Research Interests

Publications

Network Science, Computational Communication, Text as Data

My interdisciplinary research agenda spans from making methodological advances in network science to answering fundamental questions about the networked public sphere.

See Publications

Open Source Code

Natural Language Processing, Data Visualization, Social Network Analysis

I develop and maintain tools for topic modeling, interpretable sentiment analysis, data visualization, and statistical network modeling.

See Code & Tools
